post.title: I love torrent XD
post.body:
Okay. All people using Zeronet knows [torrent](https://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/BitTorrent_(protocole)) (or P2P).

If you know torrent you knows laws about the illegal download.

But f*ck the laws i use torrent. And anyone can stop me (Even donald trump cannot stop me). But as even if I can not go to prison because I downloaded Snoopy for my child, I think that would be good :D.

When you download with a torrent client (and you use internet,oops zeronet), use a VPN, it's useful: I suggest you those:

-[Tunnelbear](https://www.tunnelbear.com/) (limited to 500 mo/months in free, unlimited as paid)

-(only for bittorrent) [BTGuard](https://btguard.com/) (unlimited but only paid plan)

-[SoftEther VPN Client with VPN Gate](http://www.vpngate.net/en/) (only free, open-source but not so private, because servers are hosted by volunteers)

-Betternet (free but be warry)

After the free vpn the paid (unlimited data and fast)

-[ExpressVPN](https://www.expressvpn.com/) (price ****$3.65**/month and it's best VPN!)**

-[PureVPN](https://www.purevpn.com/) (price **$3.75/month)**

-(the most known) Hide My Ass (or HDA!) (price **$6.55/month)**

I've finished. Have a good day!
